subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: A Scottish council rejected a plan by Donald Trump to build a golf course on a stretch of remote coastline that is home to some of the country’s rarest birds. After a debate lasting two and a half hours, Aberdeenshire Council’s Infrastructure Committee rejected plans for the Trump International Golf Links after a tie-breaking vote. A spokesman for Trump said he was looking at alternative sites in other European countries.
